thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Adma Biologics Reports FY'17 Financial Results

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Adma Biologics Reports FY'17 Financial Results
text:
March 5 (Reuters) - Adma Biologics Inc:
* ADMA BIOLOGICS REPORTS FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * ADMA BIOLOGICS - ‍BELIEVE PROGRESS MADE WITH COMPLIANCE ENHANCEMENT PROGRAM ALLOWED REMEDY OF IDENTIFIED COMPLIANCE ISSUES AT BOCA FACILITY​
* ADMA BIOLOGICS - ‍BELIEVE CO NOW READY FOR ROUTINE INSPECTION OF BOCA FACILITY BY U.S. FDA
* ADMA BIOLOGICS - ‍AT DEC 31, 2017, HAD CASH, CASH EQUIVALENTS, SHORT-TERM INVESTMENTS OF $43.1 MILLION, VERSUS $15.3 MILLION AT DEC 31, 2016​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
